text: Pedro Manuel Barata de Macedo Lima (20 April 1971 â€“ 20 June 2020) was a Portuguese-Angolan actor and swimmer. He was best known for appearing in telenovelas in Portugal. He was also an Olympic swimmer and participated in the 1988 and 1992 Olympic games. He starred as Ilha dos Amores and Second Life. Lima was born in Luanda, Portuguese Angola. Lima died on 20 June 2020 Cascais, Portugal at the age of 49. His death is believed to be a suicide. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Suicides Category:Portuguese television actors Category:Portuguese movie actors Category:Olympians for Portugal Category:Swimmers
title: Pedro Lima (actor)
